```{r}
#install.packages("datasauRus")
#install.packages("ggplot2")
#install.packages("dplyr")

library(datasauRus)
library(ggplot2)
library(dplyr)

datasaurus_dozen %>%
  group_by(dataset) %>%
  summarize(
    mean_x    = mean(x),
    mean_y    = mean(y),
    std_dev_x = sd(x),
    std_dev_y = sd(y),
    corr_x_y  = cor(x,y)
  )
```
```{r}
#
library(datasauRus)
library(ggplot2)
ggplot(datasaurus_dozen, aes(x = x, y = y, colour = dataset))+
  geom_point()+
  theme_void()+
  theme(legend.position = "none")+
  facet_wrap(~dataset, ncol = 3)
```
```{r}
#
library(datasauRus)
library(ggplot2)
library(dplyr)

away_data <- datasaurus_dozen %>% filter(dataset == "away")

away_lm <- lm(y ~ x, data = away_data)

summary(away_lm)

ggplot(away_data, aes(x = x, y = y)) +
  geom_point(color = "red") +
  geom_smooth(method = "lm", se = FALSE, color = "black") +  
  ggtitle("RegresiÃ³n lineal 'away'") +
  theme_minimal()  
```
